basics.name: Usama Ejaz
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I'm a full stack developer. I love working with modern and open source technologies. I have had much experience in working on small to large-scale apps and projects.

education.institution: Government College of Science, Wahdat Road
Government Pilot Secondary School, Wahdat Road

work.summary: The next-gen software company. I am responsible for running several projects under the company.

highlights: One of the best customer support solutions in the market
Fast, efficient and super-easy to use
work.summary: A fully customized customer support solution. I worked on Trakdesk since it was born. Major languages I wrote code in were Javascript and PHP. I was responsible for almost all of the Javascript code for the project.
SaSa is a Hong Kong-based chain store company. I analyzed performance issues and provided solutions to maximize their infrastructure's performance.
AdReport is an advertising monitoring company. I build NodeJS based spiders / bots for monitoring ads on several channels.
Etisalat is one of the largest telecommunications companies in the world. My part was to build the program using NodeJS to execute some operator transactions smoothly and faster.
Throughout my time, I was involved with a number of interesting freelance projects.
